name: Resistance
display_help: The Alpha Wolf is resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. It also has a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

name: Vicious_Bite
display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Beasts can super leap!

name: Wild_Charge
display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

name: Maiming_Bite
display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Growl
display_help: The Alpha Wolf snarls at nearby enemies reducing their Damage and Chance to Hit moderately for a short time. Recharge: Slow

name: Train_Beasts
display_help: Your Alpha Wolf has been trained, it can now using Maiming Bite and Growl.

name: Howl
display_help: The Wolf lets out a piercing Howl inspiring nearby beasts to greater acts of ferocity thus increasing their damage output briefly. Recharge: Very Slow

name: Lick_Wounds
display_help: Should the beast become wounded they will lick their wounds to recover a small amount of health and recover additional health over time. Recharge: Long

name: Tame_Beasts
display_help: Your Alpha Wolf has been tamed it can now use Howl and Lick Wounds.

name: Fire
display_help: You are taking Fire damage from the flames.

name: Avoid
display_help: Foes will avoid this area.

name: Resistance
display_help: Robots are resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. It has a Plasma Blast and melee Smash attack.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

name: Plasma_Blast
display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

name: Smash
display_help: The Assault Bot has Disoriented you.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Bots can Super Leap

name: Dual_Plasma_Blast
display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

name: Flamethrower
display_help: The Assault Bot's Flamethrower is doing Fire damage over time to you.

name: Equip
display_help: This Assault Bot has been Equipped. It can now fire Dual Plasma Blasts and has a Flamethrower.

name: Swarm_Missiles
display_help: Assault Bot can launch a pack of 8 Swarm missiles.

name: Incendiary_Swarm_Missiles
display_help: Assault Bot can launch a pack of 8 Incendiary Swarm missiles.

name: Upgrade
display_help: This Assault Bot has been Upgraded. It can now fire Swarm Missiles and Incendiary Missiles.

name: Caltrops
display_help: All foes that walk through the Caltrops will be Slowed and take damage.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Synaptic Overload. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Synaptic Overload. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Synaptic Overload. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Chain Jolt. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Charge
display_help: You still carry a charge leftover from the Stunning Aura. You may accidentally release this charge and zap a nearby ally.

name: Resistance
display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also hurl Ice Bolts at their foes.
display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demonlings can Super Leap

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can use an Ice Blast attack.

name: Frost_Breath
display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Frost Breath.

name: Resistance
display_help: Body armor gives the Commando resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse, Fear and Placate. His experience in the elements makes him slightly resistant to Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. He can fire a Burst or a single heavy Slug from his Assault Rifle.
display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Burst
display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Slug
display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Commandos can Super Leap

name: Buckshot
display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of Buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Full_Auto
display_help: Opens up your assault rifle on Full Auto to lay down a massive spray of bullets at your target. Although very slow to reload, damage from this attack is massive, shredding all targets within the narrow cone of effect. There's a chance you may land a lucky shot for extra damage. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Equip
display_help: This Commando has been Equipped. He can now fire Buckshot or fire a Full Auto burst from his Assault Rifle.

name: M30_Grenade
display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Flamethrower
display_help: Spews forth a cone of flames from underneath the barrel of your assault rifle, setting foes on fire. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Extreme(DoT) Recharge: Slow

name: LRM_Rocket
display_help: The LRM Rocket is a powerful piece of hardware. It is very accurate and has a very long range. The impressive round can knock down its target. Like most sniper attacks, you must take your time to aim, so this attack can be interrupted. You must have two other Munitions Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Sniper (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG(Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

name: Tactical_Upgrade
display_help: This Commando has been Tactically Upgraded. He can now fire a M30 Grenade, LRM Rocket and Flamethrower from his Assault Rifle.

name: Resistance
display_help: Demon Princes are resistant to Fear, Confuse, Placate and Sleep effects. They also have defense against Lethal, Smashing, Fire and Cold attacks. They can use Ice Blast and Shiver.
display_short_help: Auto: Def(Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold) Res(Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Shiver
display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demons can Super Leap

name: Chilling_Embrace
display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Ice_Sword
display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Block_of_Ice
display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed and take some Cold damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: This Demon Prince has been Enchanted. He is now has access to Chilling Embrace, Ice Sword and Block of Ice.

name: Ice_Slash
display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Frozen_Aura
display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. When you perform a Frozen Aura, nearby foes will be frozen within a fragile casing of ice and suffer a moderate amount of cold damage. These frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals moderate damage. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: This Demon Prince has been Empowered. It can now use Ice Slash and Frozen Aura.

name: Resistance
display_help: Dire Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

name: Vicious_Bite
display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Beasts can super leap!

name: Wild_Charge
display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

name: Chilling_Howl
display_help: The Dire Wolf lets out a concentrated, but narrow blast of arctic air that chills foes causing Moderate Cold damage and additional lingering Cold damage as well as reducing the target's movement and attack speeds. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Moderate DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed, -Fly

name: Freezing_Roar
display_help: The Dire Wolf breathes out freezing air in a broad cone in front of it chilling all foes for Moderate Cold damage and lingering Cold Damage over time. Affected foes will also have their movement and attack speeds reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

name: Maiming_Bite
display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Train_Beasts
display_help: Your Dire Wolf has been trained, it can now use Maiming Bite and Chilling Howl.

name: Terrible_Howl
display_help: The Dire Wolf is capable of letting out a Terrible Roar that will cause High Cold damage, slow and terrorize all nearby foes for a short time. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Foe Terrorize, Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed

name: Will_of_the_Wild
display_help: When the Dire Wolf is dangerously low on health it will become enraged and suffer significantly less damage for a short time as well as recovering a portion of its health. Once this power wears off it will leave it partially drained of endurance. Recharge: Very Long

name: Tame_Beasts
display_help: Your Dire Wolf has been tamed it can now use Terrible Howl and Will of the Wild.

name: Resistance
display_help: Battle Drones are resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. Battle Drones can fire a Laser Blast and Smash foes at melee.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Bots can Super Leap

name: Laser_Burst
display_help: Fires a laser. Recharge: Moderate

name: Smash
display_help: The Robot has smashed you.

name: Heavy_Laser_Burst
display_help: This Heavy Leaser Burst takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and can send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Equip
display_help: This Battle Drone has been Equipped. It can now fire a Heavy Laser Burst.

name: Full_Auto_Laser
display_help: You are being blasted by a Full Auto attack from the Robots Laser Blaster.

name: Upgrade
display_help: This Battle Drone has been Upgraded. It can now fire a Full Auto Last Blast attack.

name: Resistance
display_help: Ember Demons are resistant to Fear effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Fire Blast and Shield of Hellfire.
display_short_help: Auto Res Fear, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Shield_of_Hellfire
display_help: The Ember Demon bathes your allies in an Ember Shield increasing their damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage.
display_short_help: Auto PBAoE, Ally +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)

name: Ember_Shield_Owner
display_help: The Ember Demon's Ember Shield grants an additional damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Toxic, Cold and Fire damage bonus to its owner.
display_short_help: Auto PBAoE, Owner +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Toxic)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demons can Super Leap

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Mending
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. This power can only be used on other summoned demons. Recharge: Fast

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: Your Ember Demon has been Enchanted. It can now heal demon allies using Abyssal Mending as well as use its Fire Breath power.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Reconstruction
display_help: An Ember Demon can channel hellfire through all nearby allies. This power has a long recharge and can only be used on allies.

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: Your Ember Demon has been Empowered. It can now use Fire Ball and Abyssal Reconstruction.

name: Resistance
display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also hurl fiery flares at their foes.
display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

name: Flares
display_help: Relentless but slow.

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demonlings can Super Leap

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can now use a Fire Blast attack.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Fire Breath.

name: Resistance
display_help: Genin have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks. They are resistant to Confuse and Taunt and are excellent runners. Genin have a Thunder Kick and Shurikens.

name: Thunder_Kick
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Shuriken
display_help: Small throwing weapon.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Genin can jump high.

name: Snap_Shot
display_help: Small throwing weapon.

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Train
display_help: This Genin has been Trained. He can now throw more powerful Shuriken and can use a Storm Kick.

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Crane_Kick
display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Enlighten
display_help: This Genin has been Enlightened. He can now use a Crane Kick and throw Exploding Shuriken. He can now also Super Leap.

name: Resistance
display_help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage. They can cast Ghastly Blasts, Life Drain, and can hold foes with a Necroplasmic Grasp.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic

name: Phase_Shift
display_help: Ghosts can Phase Shift into the negative plane and becomes out of sync with normal space. While Phase Shifted, they are in touch with their native plane and can regenerate quickly.

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Ghastly_Blast
display_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by a Ghastly Blast.

name: Fly
display_help: Ghosts Spirits can Fly!

name: Life_Drain
display_help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

name: Enchant
display_help: This Ghost has been Enchanted. It can now cast Life Drain.

name: Necroplasmic_Grasp
display_help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.

name: Empower
display_help: This Ghost has been Empowered. It can now cast Necroplasmic Grasp.

name: Electric_Brawl
display_help: Gremlins can shock foes with their punch.

name: Jolting_Chain
display_help: Gremlins can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasms and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Resist_Energy
display_help: Gremlins take less damage from Energy attacks, can jump quite high, and can travel quickly.

name: Resistance
display_help: Demonlings are resistant to Placate and Disorient effects. They are also resistant to Lethal, Smashing, Fire, Cold and Toxic damage. They can also use Corruption on their foes.
display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Terrorize, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

name: Corruption
display_help: You fire a bolt of hellfire corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demonlings can Super Leap

name: Hellfire
display_help: Sends a Blast of Hellfire at a targeted foe dealing both Fire and Toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: This Demonling has been Enchanted. It can now use a Hellfire blast attack.

name: Hellfire_Breath
display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of hellfire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: This Demonling has been Empowered. It can now use Hellfire Breath.

display_short_help: Auto Res Placate, Disorient, Sleep, Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Toxic

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Claw_Slash
display_help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal and toxic damage. This attack also has a chance to knock down an enemy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Corruption
display_help: You fire a bolt of hellfire corrupting your victim's very living essence dealing minor toxic damage as well as reducing their damage resistance for a short time. Damage: Minor Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Minor DoT (Toxic), -Res

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Demons can Super Leap

name: Breath_of_Hellfire
display_help: You spew hellfire from your mouth dealing fire and toxic damage too all enemies within its short and narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range, all foes that are hit will have the damage resistance decreased. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Hellfire_Aura
display_help: While active, you are surrounded by unholy flames that burn all foes that attempt to enter melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Enchant_Demon
display_help: Your Hellfire Gargoyle has been Enchanted. It is now wreathed in a Hellfire Aura dealing toxic damage to those that get near it and can use Breath of Hellfire.

name: Hellfire_Smash
display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Hellfire clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Hellfire_Burst
display_help: Your mastery of hellfire allows you to conjure up this unholy flame at will blasting any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Abyssal_Empowerment
display_help: Your Hellfire Gargoyle has been Empowered. It can now use Hellfire Smash and Hellfire Burst.

name: Resistance
display_help: Howler Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

name: Vicious_Bite
display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Beasts can super leap!

name: Wild_Charge
display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

name: Maiming_Bite
display_help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Train_Beasts
display_help: Your Howler Wolves have been trained, they can now use Maiming Bite.

name: Howl
display_help: The Wolf lets out a piercing Howl inspiring nearby beasts to greater acts of ferocity thus increasing their damage output briefly. Recharge: Very Slow

name: Throat_Bite
display_help: The wolf charges its foe in an attempt to knock them off guard. Feral Charge causes high lethal damage, reduces defense and has a good chance to knock its target down. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

name: Tame_Beasts
display_help: Your Howler Wolves have been tamed, they can now use Howl and Throat Bite.

name: Resistance
display_help: Jounin have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks. They are resistant to Confuse and Taunt and are excellent runners. They can use a Sting of the Wasp and a Gambler's Cut with their Ninja Blade. Jounin can also use Caltrops.

name: Hack
display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

name: Slash
display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

name: Caltrops
display_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Jounin can Super Leap

name: Disembowel
display_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

name: Poison_Dart
display_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.

name: Placate
display_help: You have been Placated.

name: Train
display_help: This Jounin has been Trained. He can now use a Soaring Dragon with his Ninja Blade and can fire Poison Darts.

name: Head_Splitter
display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Head Splitter even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Blinding_Powder
display_help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.

name: Hide
display_help: The very essence of what makes a Stalker. Hide allows you to blend into your environment, making you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment related powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

name: Enlighten
display_help: This Jounin has been Enlightened. He can now execute a Golden Dragonfly. He can also Hide and use Blinding Powder.

name: KineticTransfer
display_help: Your Damage has been buffed by Kinetic Transfer

name: KineticTransfer
display_help: Your Damage has been buffed by Kinetic Transfer

name: KineticTransfer
display_help: Your Damage has been debuffed by Kinetic Transfer

name: Resistance
display_help: The Lich is resistant to Sleep and Fear. It is also resistant to Negative Energy, Toxic and Cold damage. The Lich can cast Dark Blast and Torrent.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Negative, Toxic, Cold

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

name: Torrent
display_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Liches can Super Leap

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

name: Life_Drain
display_help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

name: Enchant
display_help: This Lich has been Enchanted. He can now cast Tenebrous Tentacles and Life Drain.

name: Fearsome_Stare
display_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

name: Petrifying_Gaze
display_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!

name: Mode2
display_help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

name: Empower
display_help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

name: Resistance
display_help: Lionesses are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
display_short_help: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: The beast swipes their target with their razor sharp claws causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)

name: Vicious_Bite
display_help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Moderate Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT (Lethal)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Beasts can super leap!

name: Wild_Charge
display_help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

name: Lions_Roar
display_help: At the beginning of battle the Lion will let out a terrible roar that bolsters the defense of nearby beasts moderately for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

name: Lick_Wounds
display_help: Should the beast become wounded they will lick their wounds to recover a small amount of health and recover additional health over time. Recharge: Long

name: Train_Beasts
display_help: The Lioness has been trained and now can use Lick Wounds and Train Beasts.

name: Ferocious_Growl
display_help: The beast rattles her foes by letting out a ferocious growl. Affected foes will be stunned for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

name: Claw_Swipe
display_help: The beast lashes out with a very wide swipe of its claws striking all foes in front of them causing Moderate Lethal damage and causing Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)

name: Tame_Beasts
display_help: The Lioness has been tamed and can now use Ferocious Growl and Claw Swipe.

name: Resistance
display_help: Living Hellfire can only exist on the material plane for a short time, they have moderate resistance to fire and toxic damage.

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: Self Destruct

name: Claw_Rake
display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Resistance
display_help: Body armor gives Soldiers resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He has a Sub Machine Gun Burst, and has a Med Kit to heal allies.

name: Med_Kit
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. This power is interruptible, so you shouldn't use this in combat.

name: SMG_Burst
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Medics can Super Leap

name: SMG_Heavy_Burst
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

name: Equip
display_help: This Medic has been Equipped. He can now fire a Heavy Burst.

name: Stimulant
display_help: Frees an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear or Confuse effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. This power is interruptible and shouldn't be used in the heat of combat.
display_short_help: Close, Ally Res(Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse)

name: Frag_Grenade
display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

name: Tactical_Upgrade
display_help: This Medic has been Tactically Upgraded. He now has a Hand Grenade and can use a Stimulant on Allies to protect them from control effects.

name: Resistance
display_help: Oni are resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Confuse and Taunt. They have improved Defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks and are excellent runners. The Oni has a Fiery Katana and can cast Fire Blast.
display_short_help: Auto Res(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +DEF(All but Psionics), +SPD,

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Oni can Super Leap

name: Fire_Sword_Slash
display_help: You are on fire and burning!

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You are on fire and burning!

name: Fire_Sword_Hack
display_help: You are on fire and burning!

name: Ring_of_Fire
display_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and preventing you from moving.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You are on fire and burning!

name: Train
display_help: This Oni has been Trained. He now has a seconds attack with his Fiery Katana, can cast Ring of Fire and has Fire Breath.

name: Char
display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring him with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Rain_of_Fire
display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long

name: Enlighten
display_help: This Oni has been Enlightened. He can now cast Char and Rain of Fire.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Protector Bot is resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. It has a Laser Burst and can cast Force Shields on allies.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

name: Laser_Burst
display_help: Fires a Heavy laser. Recharge: Moderate

name: Force_Shield
display_help: You have been given a Force Shield. Your Defense to attacks is increased.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Bots can Super Leap

name: Heavy_Laser_Burst
display_help: This Heavy Leaser Burst takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and can send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Repair
display_help: Repairs one Robot Henchmen. This power only works on your Robot Henchmen. Recharge: Slow

name: Equip
display_help: This Protector Bot has been Equipped. It can now Fire a Heavy Laser Burst and can Repair other Robots.

name: Photon_Grenade
display_help: The Photon Grenade has Disoriented you.

name: Seeker_Drones
display_help: You creates two Seeker Drones. These Seeker Drones will follow you until they detect an enemy and then they will zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

name: Upgrade
display_help: This Protector Bot has been Upgraded. It can now fire a Photon Grenade and create Seeker Drones.

name: Rending_Flurry_Normal
display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

name: Rending_Flurry_Large
display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

name: Savage_Leap_AoE
display_help: You throw yourself at your distant foes while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing your foes to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you leap from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Savage Leap build 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: Superior, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport

name: Feral_Charge
display_help: You throw yourself at your distant foes while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing your foes to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you leap from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Savage Leap build 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: Superior, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport

name: SiphonPower
display_help: Boosts Friends Damage

name: Resistance
display_help: Grave Knights are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage. He can Hack and Slash with his Rusty Sword and can fire Dark Blasts.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Skeletons can Super Leap

name: Gloom
display_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

name: Enchant
display_help: This Grave Knight has been Enchanted. He can now perform a Disembowel attack and he can cast Gloom.

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Siphon_Life
display_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

name: Mode2
display_help: This Grave Knight has been Empowered. His Sword is now magical and more accurate. He can now perform a Head Slitter attack and can Siphon Life.

name: Empower
display_help: This Grave Knight has been Empowered. His Sword is now magical and more accurate. He can now perform a Head Slitter attack and can Siphon Life.

name: Brawl

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Soldiers can Super Leap

name: Equip
display_help: This Mercenary Soldier has been Equipped. He now has a Heavy Burst.

name: Assault_Rifle_Auto_Fire
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Assault Rifle.

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Assault Rifle.

name: Assault_Rifle_Heavy_Burst
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Assault Rifle.

name: Tactical_Upgrade
display_help: This Mercenary Soldier has been Tactically Upgraded. He now has an Assault Rifle and can fire a Full Auto Burst.

name: Resistance
display_help: Body armor gives this Spec Ops Soldier resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage. Their training makes them resistant to Confuse and Placate. He can fire a Burst, Heavy Burst and Web Grenade from his SCAR Rifle.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: SCAR_Burst
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Advanced Submachine Gun.

name: SCAR_Heavy_Burst
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the Advanced Submachine Gun.

name: Web_Grenade
display_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Spec-Ops can Super Leap

name: Rifle_Butt
display_help: You have been Disoriented with a Rifle butt.

name: Flash_Bang
display_help: The Flash Bang Grenade has exploded near you. You feel Disoriented and cannot focus. Your chance to hit and Perception have been reduced.

name: Equip
display_help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Equipped. He can now fire a Flash-Bang Grenade from his SCAR Rifle to Disorient foes. He can also Disorient foes with a Rifle Butt.

name: SCAR_Snipe
display_help: The SpecOps Combat assault rifle, or SCAR, can be used as a Sniper Rifle to take out a target at extreme range.

name: Tear_Gas
display_help: The Tear Gas is making you choke. Your Damage is Debuffed.

name: Stealth
display_help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense from melee and ranged attacks. If, however, you attack while using this power, you will be discovered and will lose your Stealth and some of your Defense bonus. Stealth will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Very low Endurance cost.

name: Tactical_Upgrade
display_help: This Spec Ops Soldier has been Tactically Upgraded. He can now fire a Sniper Shot from his SCAR and a Tear Gas Grenade that can choke and debuff a foes Damage. He can also use Stealth.

name: Static_Field
display_help: All foes that pass near this field will be electrocuted.

name: Thorntrops
display_help: All foes that walk through the Thorntrops will be Slowed and take damage.

name: Resistance
display_help: Experiences gives the Arsonist some resistance to Fire. He can throw Molotov Cocktails and is an excellent Brawler.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Arsonists can Super Leap

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Molotov_Cocktail
display_help: The Arsonist has set you on fire with his Molotov Cocktail!

name: Spit_Fire
display_help: The arsonist can breath or Spit Fire by spaying alcohol from his mouth and igniting it with his lighter. Spit Fire burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Equipped
display_help: This Arsonist has been Equipped. He can now Breath Fire.

name: Fire_Bomb
display_help: The Arsonist has set you on fire with his Petrol Bomb!

name: Upgraded
display_help: This Arsonist has been Upgraded. He can now throw petrol bomb and ignite the ground.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Bruiser is a Brute. He has good resistance to Lethal and Smashing Damage and some resistance to Fire and Cold Damage. He is street wise and Their training makes them resistant to Confuse, Fear and Placate. His experience in the elements makes him slightly resistant to Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. He can fire a Burst or a single heavy Slug from his Assault Rifle.
display_short_help: Auto Res(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Fear, Confuse, Placate)

name: Jab
display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Punch
display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Fury
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Fury_Buff
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage_Dampen
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Thugs can Super Leap

name: Haymaker
display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

name: Equipped
display_help: This Bruiser has been Equipped. He now has Haymaker, and Hand Clap.

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: You can perform a Knockout Blow on your opponent. This punch does Superior damage, and has a great chance of Holding your target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Upgraded
display_help: This Bruiser has been Upgraded. He now has Knockout Blow, Hurl, and Foot Stomp.

name: Resistance
display_help: Leather Jackets gives the Enforcer some resistance to Lethal Damage. He can fire a Burst and Heavy Burst with his Sub-machine Gun. He is also a very good leader and can buff the Defense of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Maneuvers.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Maneuvers
display_help: This Thugs Defense to all attacks is improved due to good leadership in Maneuvers from your Lieutenant.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Thugs can Super Leap

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

name: UZI_Cone_Blast

name: Tactics
display_help: This Thugs Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good Leadership in Tactics from your Lieutenant.

name: Equipped
display_help: This Enforcer has been Equipped. He now has Dual 9mm UZIs. He can also increase the Damage of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Tactics.

name: Dual_UZIs
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

name: Blast_Clip
display_help: You are getting pelted by an exploding clip of ammo.

name: Assault
display_help: This Thugs damage is improved due to good leadership in Tactics from your Lieutenant.

name: Upgraded
display_help: This Enforcer has been Upgraded. He can now fire both UZIs in a massive spay of lead. He can also throw an ammo clip and blast it in mid air. His leadership in Assault can now increase the Accuracy of all nearby thugs.

name: Resistance
display_help: Punks have no inherent resistances. They do, however, benefit greatly from the Leadership of an Enforcer. This Punk carries a Pistol and is an excellent Brawler.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Thugs can Super Leap

name: Pistols
display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Dual_Wield
display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Equipped
display_help: This Punk has been Equipped. He now has a Dual Pistols.

name: Empty_Clips
display_help: The thug empties the clips of both his pistols into you.

name: Upgraded
display_help: This Punk has been Upgraded. He can now Empty his Clips in a cone attack.

name: Resistance
display_help: Thug Posse are many, but they are very weak.

display_help: Self Destruct

name: Baseball_Bat
display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Knife
display_help: Basic stabbing and cutting blade.

name: Pipe
display_help: Pick up a stick or a piece of pipe and clobber your foes.

name: Automatic_Pistol
display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

name: Revolver
display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

name: Rock
display_help: Thugs can pick up a small rocks and throw then at their foes. Not much damage.

name: Sledgehammer
display_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

display_help: Relentless but slow.

display_help: The Zombie's toxic vomits is burning your flesh.
